title: Assembling Ranked 5's Team (recruiting)
body:
Trialling co-operative team players.
If you're looking for a competitive team that synergizes your strengths with the rest of the team whilst improving as a team, then leave a comment describing your favourite roles, playstyles and (if you want) history in other MOBAs (eg dota, dota2, smite, hots, hon, other warcraft mod maps too).
[Requires at least 17 years of age + microphone and sound]

replies.body:
gold 5 main support can play all lanes pretty good 
can play any support majestically

hey im bronze 5 but am aiming to climb with a team, i am 19 years old and i have a mic of course, my roles in order from strongest to weakest are: ADC, Support, Top, Mid, Jg.

Add me if you are looking for players, i am willing to learn another role if needed
You can add me one hashshashin if you are still in need of a spot filled i play any roles though from strongest to weakest it would probably be top, adc, mid, jg, sup

silver 5 i am also looking to climb with a team and improve on my co-op skills within a team would love to join , my preferred roles are adc,mid, IGN: Locky
im 17 and have a mic

I'm also looking for a team, currently gold 5 however I don't really play soloQ. I'm looking to climb with a team.
My pref roles are Support/ADC though I'm confident in all lanes.
IGN: Ironbox
